headline: Incoming Hershey CEO faces wall of challenges, not least cocoa
summary: Kirk Tanner will need plenty of tools in his kit bag to return confectionery volumes to positive territory.

raw.headline: Incoming Hershey CEO faces wall of challenges, not least cocoa
raw.summary: Kirk Tanner will need plenty of tools in his kit bag to return confectionery volumes to positive territory.

headline: Ferrero Puts Snap, Crackle and Pop into Its Earnings With WK Kellogg Acquisition
summary: Ferrero previously bought Nestlé’s US candy biz for $2.8 billion, as well as chocolate-maker Fannie May and RedHots owner Ferrara.

raw.headline: Ferrero Puts Snap, Crackle and Pop into Its Earnings With WK Kellogg Acquisition
raw.summary: Ferrero previously bought Nestlé’s US candy biz for $2.8 billion, as well as chocolate-maker Fannie May and RedHots owner Ferrara.

headline: CFOs On the Move: Week ending July 11
summary: Wendy’s finance chief steps in as interim CEO, OpenText’s CFO exits for banking CEO role and Wolfspeed names a new CFO amid restructuring efforts.

raw.headline: CFOs On the Move: Week ending July 11
raw.summary: Wendy’s finance chief steps in as interim CEO, OpenText’s CFO exits for banking CEO role and Wolfspeed names a new CFO amid restructuring efforts.
